item.title: The Joy of Reading Hemingway
item.description: Recently, Kent had the misfortune of picking “A Moveable Feast", by Ernest Hemingway, for a school assignment. I know I am not the right person1 to judge anyone’s writing style, I am simply recollecting the comments Kent has made while reading the book. So far, other than finding the book boring — mind it, he is barely 13 — he is puzzled at the use of French terms that he wonders how would the “everyday” American reader comprehend.
